text: High Seize is a turn-based tactics video game for the Nokia N-Gage, published by Nokia and developed by RedLynx, released in late 2005. ==Story== A retired navy captain is forced return to his swashbuckling days, as his father is kidnapped by a notorious pirate. As events unfolds, the captain has to hunt for mythical treasures and take on the most feared of all pirates, Black Barlow. ==Features== High Seize can be played both as a single-player game, and in a multi-player mode, using either hot-seat, N-Gage Arena or a local Bluetooth connection. ==Reception== The game received "generally favorable reviews" according to the review aggregation website Metacritic. ==References== ==External links== * Category:N-Gage games Category:2005 video games Category:Turn-based tactics video games Category:Naval video games Category:Video games developed in Finland Category:RedLynx games Category:Nokia games
title: High Seize
